2. HOMO level: This is the entity being referred to as the "HOMO level", which is a measure of the highest occupied molecular orbital (HOMO) in a molecule. In this context, the goal is to lower the HOMO level by combining the Nalkylpyrrole-2,5-dione molecule with the thieno [3,4-b]thiophene molecule.
